name: Glass Butter Dish with Lid for Countertop and Refrigerator, Extra Large Butter Keeper Container Storage with Handle for Fridge, Butter Holder for Counter, Butter Tray Clear Covered Butter Dishes
short_description: 【Extra Large Capacity】The extra large butter dish with lid measures 7.4"x 5.5"x 2.5", wide and deep enough to store up to two standard sticks of butter. The butter stick holder works perfectly for both WEST and EAST / EUROPEAN coast butter. The butter dishes for counter accommodate a perfect amount of butter for everyday use. (Please note the size before purchasing, our products are large size) 【Elegant and Natural Design】The butter keeper is made of high quality borosilicate glass and natural bamboo base. Natural bamboo is hygienic and great for using with food. The flat bottom of the butter dish makes cutting butter easy, especially if you want thin slices and this dish can also be used as a cheese board. The clear cover allows you to see how much butter is left and it's great for daily use. 【Airtight Lid with Handle】The high quality glass fits perfectly into a deep groove in the bamboo base, providing an airtight environment to ensure your butter stays fresh. With a handle on top to make taking the top off easier without using both hands and keep the lid clean. The handle is removable and is very sturdy. When the package is received, the handle needs to be installed manually or not according to your preference. 【Easy to use and clean】There is a locking indentation around the dish to keep the cover from sliding. The glass lid is dishwasher safe and the bamboo plate of the covered butter dish is easy to wash with a damp cloth. The simple and pretty design of our butter dish with lid allows it to fit right into your kitchen and on your countertops. The butter tray is very space saving and also can be placed in the refrigerator. 【Perfect Gift for Butter Lovers】Our cute butter dish is packaged securely in a premium box, this glass butter dish with lid is a great fit for fans of Kerrygold, Land O'Lakes, Plugra Butter, and more. Surprise your family and friends on special occasions like weddings, birthdays, housewarming or Christmas with a modern and stylish item that is also practical and sustainable.
